member.name: T:SandcastleBuilderConsole.SandcastleBuilderConsole
member.summary: This is the console mode version of the Sandcastle Help File Builder.

member.name: M:SandcastleBuilderConsole.SandcastleBuilderConsole.Main(System.String[])
member.param: The command line arguments. This should be a list of projects to build and an optional "/v" option to provide verbose output.
member.returns: Zero on success, non-zero on failure

member.name: M:SandcastleBuilderConsole.SandcastleBuilderConsole.LoadResponseFile(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.List{SandcastleBuilderConsole.OptionInfo})
member.summary: Load settings from a response file.
member.param: The option list to which the content is added.
member.remarks: Nested response files are supported. Blank lines and lines starting with '#' (comments) are ignored.

member.name: M:SandcastleBuilderConsole.SandcastleBuilderConsole.AddAssemblyWildCard(System.String,SandcastleBuilder.Utils.SandcastleProject,System.Boolean)
member.summary: This is called to add multiple assemblies and/or comments files to a project for documenting.
member.param: The project to which they are added.
True if adding comments only, false if adding assembly/comments file pairs.

member.name: M:SandcastleBuilderConsole.SandcastleBuilderConsole.ShowHelp
member.summary: This is used to show the command line syntax

member.name: M:SandcastleBuilderConsole.SandcastleBuilderConsole.BuildProject(SandcastleBuilder.Utils.SandcastleProject)
member.summary: This is called to build a project
member.returns: Returns true if successful, false if not

member.name: M:SandcastleBuilderConsole.SandcastleBuilderConsole.buildProcess_BuildStepChanged(System.Object,SandcastleBuilder.Utils.BuildProgressEventArgs)
member.summary: This is called by the build process thread to update the application with the current build step.

member.name: M:SandcastleBuilderConsole.SandcastleBuilderConsole.buildProcess_BuildProgress(System.Object,SandcastleBuilder.Utils.BuildProgressEventArgs)
member.summary: This is called by the build process thread to update the application with information about progress.

member.name: T:SandcastleBuilderConsole.OptionInfo
member.summary: This is the console mode version of the Sandcastle Help File Builder.

member.name: P:SandcastleBuilderConsole.OptionInfo.OptionText
member.summary: Get the option text as specified

member.name: P:SandcastleBuilderConsole.OptionInfo.SecondValue
member.summary: Get the second option value if there was one

member.name: P:SandcastleBuilderConsole.OptionInfo.ThirdValue
member.summary: Get the third option value if there was one
